name: youtube-download-server
description: Dedicated server for YouTube audio downloads

scripts.build: npm install && node -e "const YTDlpWrap = require('yt-dlp-wrap').default; const yt = new YTDlpWrap(); yt.downloadBinary().then(() => console.log('yt-dlp binary downloaded')).catch(e => console.error('Error:', e))"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "const YTDlpWrap = require('yt-dlp-wrap').default; const yt = new YTDlpWrap(); yt.downloadBinary().then(() => console.log('yt-dlp binary ready')).catch(e => console.warn('yt-dlp download warning:', e.message))"
